com.mesosphere.sdk.framework

Class ApiServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.framework.ApiServer

  • public class ApiServer
extends java.lang.Object
    The ApiServer runs the Jetty Server that exposes the Scheduler's API.

      • getURI

        java.net.URI getURI()
        Returns the server endpoint. Mainly used for testing.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the server is not running

      • join

        public void join()
        Waits for the server to stop. If the server is not stopped, this waits forever.

        Useful for keeping the scheduler alive while only running the HTTP service.

      • stop

        void stop()
   throws java.lang.Exception
        Stops the server. Used for tests.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
